name: Final Thing Quest
description:
In Final Thing Quest you take on the role of Dahlia, a seeker of “the Thing.” She’s part of a (holy?) organisation who’s Seekers are tasked with the perilous duty of finding “the Thing” and bringing it to “the Other Thing.” Unfortunately what these items are have been lost in the murky depths of history but Dahlia has devoted her life to preparing for this sacred duty.

Final Thing Quest is an adventure story that lovingly pokes fun at the RPG genre. I’ve been a fan of turn based RPGs my whole life so this means I know their strong points, tropes and flaws very well. As such I wanted to make something that leans in to some of these aspects, yet also is fresh in its perspective.

This classic style, turn based RPG has your party exploring the world, visiting exciting towns and dungeons, all in the name of finding "the Thing". I'm also happy to say that one town in the game is an Irish speaking Gaeltacht, enhancing that sense of travel as you explore.

  • 2-3 Hours play time
  • 50 Monster types
  • Optional party member
  • Meaningful choices
  • 4 Ultimate weapons
  • Irish speaking town
  • A world of towns and villages to explore

The game was made using RPG Maker and its assets.

Additional music provided by audionautix.com

I really hope you enjoy my game and thanks for playing!
